pre_caption: This is a static, low-angle shot of two ornate, European-style buildings against a dark blue night sky. The buildings are illuminated from below, casting dramatic shadows and highlighting their architectural details. There is no movement from the camera or within the scene.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
original_caption: This is a static, low-angle shot of two ornate, European-style buildings against a dark blue night sky. The buildings are illuminated from below, casting dramatic shadows and highlighting their architectural details. There is no movement from the camera or within the scene.
initial_feedback:
Please remove the word "static" from the description. In addition to the two buildings, a railway on an overpass is visible in the bottom-right middleground. In the time-lapse, vehicle lights occasionally create streaks of blue lines as they flash past. Only the building in the foreground is illuminated by an unseen warm light source from below, while other structures remain in silhouette. The camera shows minor movement, smoothly and slowly zooming in and rolling clockwise.
